system.descriptor: Understanding Trade, Value, and Exchange. Bartering for the best deals and acquiring contraband. Understanding how valuable something is, and who would value it the most.
system.uses:
Uses: When used against an opponent, is an Opposed Test vs target's Commerce or Willpower. Can be used to gian a bonus to Logistics Tests, Tracking down a rare item in a market, figuring out the worth of a thing.
Special Use: Evaluate: Determine the Worth of an Item, rolled in secret and modified based on availability of item or commodity. Successful Test tells character the availability of the item, failiure tells nothing. 3+ Degrees of Failiure gives false Availability. (From Prior Editions: Includes Barter, Commerce, and Evaluate)
